content:
Get creative and practice the art of paper folding by using up measly dollar bills or foreign currency souvenirs you've got lying around the house to create money origami masterpieces featuring famous people wearing all manner of headpieces from around the world. You'll definitely find some inspiration in our collection of pictures, and you certainly won't equate origami with just another paper crane after you see what people have done with their money.
Take a look, and go ahead, spend some time and get creative with some money origami pieces to wow your friends and family. If you'd like an extra challenge, you might even try to name all the famous people below, the kinds of hats they're wearing and what country the currency comes from. Good luck!
Source:
title: Incredible Origami Art Created With Money
author: soniaydong
